message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at $18,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While I understand your perspective, the value of this product is considerably higher than your offer.  Could you meet me halfway at $14,000?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
